Reviews.Title: “New Year in Amsterdam!”
Reviews.Author: DavieAndAudrey
Reviews.Content: flight time glasgow 65 mins transfer time airport hotel 20 minutes taxi cost 50 euros bedroom 36 located 3rd floor hotel spotless cleaned day bedding little worn didnt comfortable beds soft 2 single beds pushed unfortunately head bed wooden beam smacked heads times safe extra charge wardrobe deskchair 22 lcd tv bbc1 music channel english speaking channels checkout 7 11am happy bags reception happily book taxi airport etc hear holiday makers beside wasnt hotel bathroom bathroom functional basically wet unfortunately beams inside showers 5 foot 6 youd smack head water pressure times usage hair dryer 2 bath 2 hand towels complimentary shampoo shower gel soap lift goes ground floor 3rd floor 4th floor tofrom breakfast basement flight steep stairs staff friendly happy help queries directions etc reception 24 hours breakfast nice offering bacon eggs cheeses cold meats etc toast pancakes cereals basically youd expect continental hotel wifi access free wifi hotel giving coverage pc main reception extra charge location 2 minutes walk dam square 10 red light district 15 minutes walk central station walking direction 10 minutes rembrandt square hotel location middle lots noise outside hotel morning building subway wasnt bad youd honest finished till 2015 ish wouldnt staying overall enjoyed stay hotel amsterdam fantastic visit hotels location makes ideal
